SANITY FOR E-COMMERCE

Drive sales with custom content

Sanity improves the quality and value of online shopping experiences.

Unify product data with marketing content to get more value and reach from what you already have.

  • Exceptional product + content experiences

  • Extend the life of e-commerce systems

  • Sell anywhere

CASE STUDY

Endlessly configurable lights powered by APIs & microservices

Rich Brilliant Willing illuminate some of the world’s most prestigious interiors. With help from Sanity and Engine Digital they transformed their B2B E-commerce experience: empowering clients with the ability to configure products to their needs from over 75,000 combinations of fixture, finish, voltage, and color temperature.

  • User-generated products

  • Time-saving automations

  • Data preprocessing for faster build times

Read the case study ->

Unlock value and exceed expectations by combining content with product in rich and transformative ways.

  • Craft authentic brand experiences

  • Build, iterate and scale as needed

  • Reach more people across more channels
